abstract: T. Rowe Price says it opposes the $24.4 billion takeover bid for Dell as it currently stands, while Southeastern Asset Management has taken additional steps to fight the management buyout.
snippet: T. Rowe Price says it opposes the $24.4 billion takeover bid for Dell as it currently stands, while Southeastern Asset Management has taken additional steps to fight the management buyout.

headline.main: Dell Faces Pressure to Raise His Offer
headline.print_headline: Dell Faces Pressure To Raise His Offer

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
